description: Add quick action buttons to coach dashboard for common tasks

userStories.title: Add Quick Actions button group component
userStories.description: As a coach, I want quick access to common actions without navigating through menus.
acceptanceCriteria: Create QuickActions component in coach dashboard folder
Component renders 4 action buttons in a grid
Buttons: 'New Assessment', 'Record Voice Note', 'Log Injury', 'Add Goal'
Responsive: 2x2 grid on mobile, 4 columns on desktop
Type checking passes: npm run check-types
Linting passes: npm run check
userStories.notes: Use shadcn Button component, Lucide icons

userStories.title: Wire up New Assessment quick action
userStories.description: As a coach, clicking 'New Assessment' should take me to the assessment page.
acceptanceCriteria: Button navigates to /orgs/[orgId]/coach/assess
Uses Next.js Link component for navigation
Button shows ClipboardList icon
Type checking passes: npm run check-types
